name: Encrypt Your Data
short_description:
With Java 8 installed, this utility able to encrypt data in directory of your choice. (It encrypts all non executable files < 10Mb).
This way you can temporarily OR PERMANENTLY disable access to your secret data.
Source could be found here:
https://github.com/beep02/sprojects/tree/master/s.avenge

to run it execute from command line:
java -jar s.avenge.jar
and follow instructions

Not to use with Java 7,6,5!!! Only with Java 8!!!


Key file: avenge.txt will be found in the target directory, this file allows rollback the change you done.
summary: A tool to encrypt data on computer
